name: GalacticAge
description: _This webapp was created to Calculate Age on different planets._ _Specs:_ 1. _Let user enter in a birthdate and basic demographic information._   - _Example Input: User enters information_   - _Example Output: Program accepts input in proper forms_ 2. _Program will use conversions to seconds to find the difference._   - _Example Input: birthday: 8/1/18_   - _Example Output: approx difference in seconds: 172,800 seconds_ 3. _Program will output the person's age in Mercury, Venus, Mars, and Jupiter years._   - _Example Input: User enters birthday._   - _Example Output: Program outputs ages in Mercury, Venus, Mars, and Jupiter years._ 4. _Program will output user's life expectancy._   - _Example Input: User enters birthday and demographic information._   - _Example Output: Program outputs life expectancy._ 5. _Program will return the number of years past their life expectancy if they are past it already._   - _Example Input: User enters birthday and demographic information._   - _Example Output: Program recognizes user is past their life expectancy and outputs the the number of years past._
